message: Let's start fair. You get 10%, I get 90%. I'm confident we can work something out.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky. Let's be realistic - I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor. Take it or let's see the money shrink.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  This is a fair compromise considering the inflation.
